name: memorabilia (itch)
description:
This is my very first game ever. It took me forever. Almost.
It sometimes was really hard. Especially in the beginning.
I didn't know much yet (and still don't :D), I didn't know how things work or how to solve problems. I fixed one problem and there were at least two new ones.
But I did it. And I like the outcome.

CREDITS

Voice overs - Tabitha Mixon 
Ambiance - klankbeeld
Menu Audio - GWriterStudio

If you wanna know what's next follow me on Twitter.

Planned for version 1.1: 

- subtitles in English and German
- bug fixes
- Mac/Linux support
